doc.title: Flip-Flap Railway
doc.plot: Taken at Coney Island, a most novel picture showing the latest method of sensational seashore amusement. The pleasure seekers are seen going down a very steep incline in the car which is specially constructed to make a complete circle in the air from what is known as the "Flip Flap" or "Loop the Loop." The car and occupants turn a complete somersault in the air and finally pass out of sight.
